Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1973...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Sets a new season UBAFowler-Record for HR with 48 on 8/26/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1987, hitting .303 with 17 HR, 37 RBI...
Sets a new season UBAFowler-Record for RBI with 143 on 9/6/1987...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1987, hitting .299 with 61 HR, 165 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Diablo on 5/11/1989...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/8/1990, off Antonio Patino (CBC)...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1992 to a minor league contract.
Released by Pontiac on 8/4/1992...
